steps.task: Compose a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are in the style of lecture notes, ensuring the note is written as one paragraph. The note should include information describing the performance characteristics of quantum computers and their advantages over classical systems.
Add the composed note onto a Notion page named 'quantum' using the note content from the previous step.

inputs.name: $note_content
inputs.description: The composed note on the performance of quantum computers.
